trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_SEQ_00<tab>Tesleen is eager to set off.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TODO_00<tab>Talk with Tesleen.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TODO_01<tab>Defeat any coyotes that threaten Tesleen.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Tesleen.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TODO_03<tab>Scout the area ahead and slay any other coyotes.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TODO_04<tab>Talk with Tesleen.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TODO_05<tab>Talk with Tesleen.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_CASSARD_000_000<tab>Take care with your desert crossing and good fortune with meeting your friend! I'll be around when you're ready to head back to the Exarch.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_010<tab>Alisaie has been desperate to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, so let's get you to her sooner rather than later!
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_011<tab>The Inn isn't too hard to find, really─you can actually see the top of the rock spires from here.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_012<tab>We just need to swing around the ridge, then head south. Come on, I'll get my supplies together and meet you outside!
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_020<tab>All set? Oh, I should probably mention the wildlife...
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_021<tab>While most of them will leave you be if you keep your distance, the local coyotes have learned to prey on folk heading home from the markets.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_022<tab>I can usually swing a sword well enough to fend them off, but I may have loaded myself down with too many bargains today...
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_023<tab>Do you think you can handle any beasts that try to make a meal of us?
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_024<tab>I thought you might. Alisaie was always saying how much y─ Um, I mean, let's get going, shall we?
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_025<tab>Speak of the curs...!
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_030<tab>Sorry, there wasn't much time to shout a warning. Were you bitten? Those things can be nasty.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_031<tab>And yet hardly a match for you, it seems! I'd always thought Alisaie was strong, but in her mind, she was never...hmmm. Now it makes sense.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_032<tab>Ahem, well we should push on! It might be best if you scout ahead and clear out any coyotes that have our scent.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_033<tab>I'll wait here so you can fight without any distractions!
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_035<tab>It might save time if you could head down past the ridge and clear out any coyotes lurking nearby.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_040<tab>Oh, thank goodness you're back. I could hear the howling and snarling from here... Frightful creatures.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_041<tab>Let's hope the rest have seen your handiwork, and know to avoid us now. I need to get these supplies back to the Inn!
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_050<tab>This is it! Thanks to you, I didn't have to drop my shopping even once! Come to think of it, I'm glad I didn't make the trip alone...

TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_051<tab>It seems <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> ended up escorting <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>! I'll have to repay the favor somehow, but first, let's head inside, shall we?
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_052<tab>Welcome to the Inn at Journey's Head. You might be our first visitor from the Crystarium since Alisaie arrived.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_053<tab>It's not much, but it's home for the afflicted and a handful of carers.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_A1_000_001<tab>The afflicted...?
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_A1_000_002<tab>This illness isn't contagious, is it?
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_A1_000_003<tab>I have some skill with healing...
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_054<tab>You...don't know?
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_055<tab>Contagious...? Well, no, not as far as we know.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_056<tab>I'm not sure you can help in this case, but...that's good to know.
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_057<tab>I don't think I've met anyone besides Alisaie who was so unfamiliar with our situation here. Most folk have grown up knowing someone who knew someone...
TEXT_LUCKMA304_03294_TESLEEN_000_058<tab>Hm. I might leave out something obvious, so it may be best to have Alisaie give you the full explanation.
